attributes.action: Introduce new legislation to help tackle bullying in schools and provide immediate support students who are being bullied.
attributes.additional_details: With the shocking rise of suicides in young people relating to bullying in schools, particularly towards LGBTQ students I find it shocking that none of these cases have been discussed in any great detail by commons or the PM himself. The purpose of this petition is to insist that the current government addresses this issue and brings in legislation to prevent bullying to such extents that children think suicide is the only answer, furthermore i propose a 24hr government service to provide immediate support to young people suffering from bullying.
